channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James Mime4J
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache James Mime4J

item.title: CVE-2024-21742|2024-06-04T17:37:41.315Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20james%20mime4j
item.description: Improper input validation allows for header injection in MIME4J library when using MIME4J DOM for composing message. This can be exploited by an attacker to add unintended headers to MIME messages.
